Category.Name: Sample Reports
Category.Description: Check our sample reports in this category

Report.Name: Territory Sales
Report.Description: This sample showcases the Tablix with Row Grouping by sales region and drill down (expand/collapse) the group details.

Report.Name: Sales Order Detail
Report.Description: This sample showcases the sales order information based on order id.

Report.Name: Invoice
Report.Description: This report showcases the Report Parameters, Expressions, Textbox and Tablix Report Item capabilities of the ReportViewer.

Report.Name: Grouping Aggregate
Report.Description: This sample showcases the sorting, group total support in Tablix report item.

Report.Name: Conditional Row Formatting
Report.Description: This sample showcases the support to view shared dataset and Tablix rows with conditional formatting.

Report.Name: Company Sales
Report.Description: This sample showcases the Sales data by year with grouping.

Report.Name: Product Line Sales
Report.Description: This sample showcases the cascading parameters support by listing the sub category products based on product category.

Report.Name: Sales Report
Report.Description: This report showcases the complete details of sales orders in Adventure Works.

Category.Name: Sample Reports (Web Designer)
Category.Description: Check our sample reports in this category

Report.Name: Website Visitor Analysis (Random data)
Report.Description: This sample analyze the user behavior for a fictitious e-commerce website.

Report.Name: Personal Expense Analysis (Random data)
Report.Description: This sample showcases the spending patterns of an individual.

Report.Name: Tickets Sales Analysis (Random data)
Report.Description: This sample analyze the tickets sold in theater.

Report.Name: Northwind Products and Suppliers Report
Report.Description: This sample showcases the sales performance of different products.

Report.Name: Patient Experience Analysis (Random data)
Report.Description: This sample analyze the patient satisfaction trends during hospital visits.

Report.Name: Customer Support representative analysis (Random data)
Report.Description: This sample analyze the efficiency of a customer support representative to use as a child report for Customer Support Analysis

Report.Name: Customer Support Analysis (Random data)
Report.Description: This sample analyze the efficiency of customer support.

Datasource.Name: Northwind
Datasource.Description: This datasource having the Northwind database connection information to use in Report and Dataset.

Datasource.Name: AdventureWorks
Datasource.Description: This datasource having the AdventureWorks database connection information to use in Report and Dataset.

Datasource.Name: ReportSampleDatabase
Datasource.Description: This datasource having the ReportSampleDatabase database connection information to use in Report and Dataset.

Datasource.Name: FoodOrderingDatabase
Datasource.Description: This datasource having the FoodOrderingDatabase database connection information to use in Report and Dataset.

Dataset.Name: Sales
Dataset.Description: This dataset having the query to get sales details from AdventureWorks DataSource.

Dataset.Name: InvoiceDetails
Dataset.Description: This dataset having the query to get invoice details from Northwind DataSource.

Dataset.Name: CustomerDetail
Dataset.Description: This dataset having the query to get customers information from AdventureWorks DataSource.
